blogilates.name: Blogilates
blogilates.description: The #1 female fitness channel on YouTube. Cassey Ho created POP Pilates in 2009, fusing traditional Pilates with pop music for fun, effective workouts.

featured_video.title: Beautiful Body Pilates - Total Body Workout

lottie_murphy.name: Lottie Murphy Pilates
lottie_murphy.description: Body Control Pilates certified instructor with 10+ years experience. Known for calming, well-structured classes with a focus on mindful movement.

pilatesbody_kayla.name: PILATESBODY by Kayla
pilatesbody_kayla.description: Certified Pilates instructor specializing in wall pilates, pelvic floor health, and prenatal/postpartum workouts. Minnesota-based studio owner with 200+ classes available.

featured_video.title: Day 1: Arms + Abs Pilates Strength with Weights

rachels_fit_pilates.name: Rachel's Fit Pilates
rachels_fit_pilates.description: B.Sc in Kinesiology, STOTT Pilates certified, Licensed Occupational Therapist. Creator of the viral 28-Day Wall Pilates Challenge with 2.3 million+ views.
rachels_fit_pilates.certification: STOTT Pilates, B.Sc Kinesiology, Licensed OT

pamela_reif.name: Pamela Reif
pamela_reif.description: German fitness phenomenon known for intense, no-talking workouts set to music. 2.18 billion+ total views. Real-time follow-along format with timer on screen.

fitness_blender.name: Fitness Blender
fitness_blender.description: Long-established fitness channel by certified trainers. Known for no-nonsense, effective workouts with detailed instruction and modifications for all levels.

featured_video.title: Pilates Abs, Butt, and Thigh Workout

heather_robertson.name: Heather Robertson
heather_robertson.description: Certified personal trainer known for high-quality, music-driven workouts. Specialty in pilates-HIIT fusion with excellent production value.

featured_video.title: HIIT Pilates Workout // Total Body Fusion

eleni_fit.name: Eleni Fit
eleni_fit.description: German fitness YouTuber specializing in standing pilates and HIIT fusion. No-talking format set to music with timed intervals (40 sec on/10 sec off).

featured_video.title: 30 Minute Cardio Pilates - Full Body HIIT

robin_long_lindywell.name: Lindywell (Robin Long)
robin_long_lindywell.description: Founder of Lindywell (formerly The Balanced Life). 15+ years teaching experience, Nutrition Therapy Practitioner, mom of 4. Known for 'grace over guilt' approach with gentle, encouraging instruction.
robin_long_lindywell.certification: Certified Pilates Instructor, Nutrition Therapy Practitioner

jessica_valant.name: Jessica Valant Pilates
jessica_valant.description: Licensed Physical Therapist (MSPT) with 25+ years experience. Specializes in women's health, injury rehabilitation, and therapeutic movement. Podcast host and author.

trifecta_pilates.name: Trifecta Pilates
trifecta_pilates.description: Beth Sandlin, NCPT, teaching since 2004. BASI Pilates comprehensive certification, trauma-informed practices specialist. Color-coded difficulty system for easy navigation.

flow_with_mira.name: Flow With Mira
flow_with_mira.description: BASI Pilates Legacy certified, BASI faculty member. Owner of Aalaya Pilates and BASI Pilates Indonesia HQ. Teaching since 2006 with dance background (Bachelor of Arts in Dance).

featured_video.title: 30 Min Full Body Pilates for Beginners

madfit.name: MadFit
madfit.description: Canadian fitness trainer known for quick, effective workouts set to popular music. Apartment-friendly with no jumping options.

move_with_nicole.name: Move With Nicole
move_with_nicole.description: Australian certified Pilates & Yoga Instructor (RYT 500). Known for calming, full-body workouts with clear instruction.

lilly_sabri.name: LEAN with Lilly
lilly_sabri.description: Qualified physiotherapist, APPI Pilates instructor. Known for effective, targeted workouts with physiotherapy principles.

bailey_brown.name: Bailey Brown Pilates
bailey_brown.description: Sydney-based instructor known for 'mind-muscle connection' focus and reformer-inspired mat workouts.

isa_welly.name: Isa Welly
isa_welly.description: STOTT Pilates certified, Nutritional Therapist. Known for dynamic, energetic workouts.

sanne_vloet.name: Sanne Vloet
sanne_vloet.description: Former Victoria's Secret Model, Certified Pilates Instructor. Known for elegant, effective no-equipment workouts.

online_pilates_classes.name: Online Pilates Classes
online_pilates_classes.description: 2nd Generation Certified Pilates Teacher (trained with Joseph Pilates' Elders). Free exercise tutorials and 30-minute mat classes weekly.

popsugar_fitness.name: POPSUGAR Fitness
popsugar_fitness.description: Features celebrity trainers including Kit Rich for Pilates content. High production value workout videos.

boho_beautiful.name: Boho Beautiful
boho_beautiful.description: Yoga-Pilates fusion specialists with stunning filming locations worldwide. Known for beautiful, mindful content.

nourish_move_love.name: Nourish Move Love
nourish_move_love.description: Barre-Pilates fusion specialist (SELF Magazine Top 3 Barre Channel). Known for pregnancy-friendly modifications.
